title: Wall Street Apparently Believes the Future Involves Making Your Software Instead of Buying It
full_text: Wall Street Apparently Believes the Future Involves Making Your Software Instead of Buying It. The release of an AI legal tool from Anthropic resulted in bloodletting for legal and business software stocks. The professional software you love may be next.. If you read between the lines of a recent scramble on Wall Street to sell off certain stocks, you can make out the fuzzy outline of a weird future: one where when you need something in your workflow … [+2424 chars]
